snippet: The Security Council resolution, which could be adopted next week, is intended to choke the terrorist group’s ability to trade in oil, antiquities and hostages.
lead_paragraph: The Security Council resolution, which could be adopted next week, is intended to choke the terrorist group’s ability to trade in oil, antiquities and hostages.

headline.main: U.N. Prepares Resolution to Confront Islamic State on Oil and Antiquities

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
